Package phicad

Class Profile

  • java.lang.Object
    • phicad.Profile
  • public class Profile
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements object that present the profile for each network IP address.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Profile​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​long[]> minMaxValues, int[] selectedValues, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedValuesProcessing, int selectedKey, int pointLength, java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter[] formats, boolean printOut, int distanceFunction, java.lang.String name, int maxChildren, int maxNumberOfNodes, double lambda, double threshold, int checkStep, int maxBins, int sizeOfBin, double delta, int largeWindowSize, double largeWindowProbability, int smallWindowSize, double smallWindowProbability, double clusterSizeThreshold, double intraClusterThreshold)
      The constructor creates new Profile object from given parameters.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Profile

        public Profile​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​long[]> minMaxValues,
               int[] selectedValues,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedValuesProcessing,
               int selectedKey,
               int pointLength,
               java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter[] formats,
               boolean printOut,
               int distanceFunction,
               java.lang.String name,
               int maxChildren,
               int maxNumberOfNodes,
               double lambda,
               double threshold,
               int checkStep,
               int maxBins,
               int sizeOfBin,
               double delta,
               int largeWindowSize,
               double largeWindowProbability,
               int smallWindowSize,
               double smallWindowProbability,
               double clusterSizeThreshold,
               double intraClusterThreshold)
        The constructor creates new Profile object from given parameters.
        Parameters:
        minMaxValues - HashMap<Integer,long[]> object that presents the minimum and maximum values for each network flow feature we analyze.
        selectedValues - Integer array that presents the indexes of network flow features to be used in analysis.
        selectedValuesProcessing - ArrayList<String> object that presents how each selected network feature should be analyzed.
        selectedKey - int array that presents indexes of parameters that present source and destination IP addresses.
        pointLength - int value that presents the length of the feature vector.
        formats - DateTimeFormatter array that presents the two datetime formats the network flows use.
        printOut - boolean value that present if verbose print in enabled.
        distanceFunction - int value that present the selected distance function.
        name - String object that presents the name of the current Profile.
        maxChildren - int value that presents the maximum number of incremental cluster features that incremental cluster feature node can store.
        maxNumberOfNodes - int value that present the maximum number of incremental cluster feature nodes that incremental cluster feature tree can store.
        lambda - double value that presents the fading factor for forgetting old data.
        threshold - double value that presents the initial incremental cluster feature radius threshold.
        checkStep - int value that presents the number of iterations before we check for anomaly.
        maxBins - int value that presents the maximum number of bins the exponential histogram can have.
        sizeOfBin - int value that presents the maximum number of values inside a single bin.
        delta - double value that presents the maximum delta (confidence) value for the ADWIN windows.
        largeWindowSize - int value that presents the size of the long-term window of short-term models.
        largeWindowProbability - double value that presents the maximum probability of a given detection mechanism triggering to still be considered useful.
        smallWindowSize - int value that presents the size of the short-term window of short-term models.
        smallWindowProbability - double value that presents the minimum probability of a given detection mechanism triggering to still be considered useful.
        clusterSizeThreshold - double value that presents the multiplication factor for the harmonic mean to determine normal clusters based on their size.
        intraClusterThreshold - double value that presents the multiplication factor for the standard deviation to determine distance threshold.
